install_please_pin_extension.message: Przypnij te rozszerzenie do paska zadań.
install_please_pin_extension.description: Prompt asking the user to pin the browser extension to the toolbar

install_logging_settings_changed.description: Message displayed when crash log settings are successfully updated

install_privacy_text.message: Prywatność łączy się z bezpieczeństwem i wygodą.
install_privacy_text.description: Text emphasizing the balance of privacy, security, and convenience

install_1_info.description: Message displayed when the browser extension is installed successfully

install_1_header.message:
Przypnij aby mieć 
szybki dostęp do 
elementów
install_1_header.description: Header encouraging the user to pin the extension for quick access

install_1_open_extension_menu.description: Instruction to open the browser's extension menu

install_1_pin_extension.description: Instruction to pin the 2FAS Pass extension to the toolbar

install_2_info.description: Message displayed when the browser extension is successfully pinned

install_2_header.description: Header encouraging the user to start using the password manager

install_2_click_icon.message: Kliknij ikonę, aby otworzyć rozszerzenie przeglądarki 2FAS Pass.
install_2_click_icon.description: Instruction to click the extension icon to open it

install_2_use_mobile_app.message: Kliknij "Połącz" w aplikacji mobilnej 2FAS Pass, aby zeskanować kod QR.
install_2_use_mobile_app.description: Instruction to use the mobile app to scan the QR code

install_3_info.message: Rozszerzenie jest odblokowane na czas tej sesji przeglądarki
install_3_info.description: Message displayed when the extension is unlocked for the current browser session

install_3_header.message:
To rozszerzenie
przeglądarki jest
gotowe do użycia
install_3_header.description: Header indicating that the browser extension is ready to use

install_3_get_started.message: Oto wszystkie informacje potrzebne do rozpoczęcia
install_3_get_started.description: Message introducing the user to the getting started guide

install_3_crash_logs_header.description: Header for the section explaining crash log permissions

install_3_crash_logs_description.message: Jeśli chcesz wesprzeć rozwój tego projektu, możesz wyrazić zgodę na wysyłanie anonimowych raportów o awariach.
install_3_crash_logs_description.description: Explains the purpose of sending anonymous crash logs to support the project

install_3_crash_logs_checkbox_descriptio.message: Chcę udostępnić anonimowe raporty o awariach.
install_3_crash_logs_checkbox_descriptio.description: Checkbox label for opting in to share anonymous crash logs

install_get_mobile_app.description: Button label for downloading the mobile app

install_scan.description: Button label for scanning the QR code with the mobile app

install_point_camera.description: Tooltip text instructing the user to point their camera at the QR code

install_download_ios_app.description: Button label for downloading the iOS app

install_download_android_app.description: Button label for downloading the Android app
